Unbox Robotics - Project Engineer

Location - Pan India (Must be ready to relocate), Work Type: Full Time

Product July 01, 2022

We are a robot technology company building intralogistics solutions for the new age of warehousing. Our focus is on building compact and flexible solutions and business models to suit the needs of E-commerce and Logistics companies across varying scale and geographies.

We incorporated in 2019 and are based out of Pune, India with a small but swiftly growing team of passionate minds.

Department

Electronics Engineering

Work Experience

2-3 years of relevant Experience in industrial automation/warehouse automation

Salary Range

Competitive Salary

Work Mode

In Office and On-site (Immediate joining preferred)

Purpose:

  • Act as a site in-charge and main point of contact with the customers.
  • Responsible for making project specific standards and its documentation
  • Implementation of projects as per standards and quality documents

Roles & Responsibilities:

  • Keep a check on inward materials,systems and network implementation, delivery, etc
  • Provide technical support for all manufacturing builds including engineering prototypes & production releases.
  • Ensure completion of projects on schedule and within the allocated budget.
  • Ensure credibility at every stage, ensure the prerequisites of sites are met, issue delivery challan, etc.
  • Utilize process excellence methodology and analytical problem-solving tools to identify and implement improvement projects
  • Stay abreast of the latest technology and techniques to provide designs that are competitive and cost effective as well as reliable in the field
  • Work with managers to provide information that will aid in the initial quoting process.
  • Prepare detailed documentation at every stage of the project.
  • Ensure that the final deliverable meets the functional specifications of the end user by doing thorough quality checks.
  • Interface with customers for technical queries and get sign offs for the delivery.

Requirements

  • Basic knowledge of Linux OS
  • Understanding of basic sensors, motors, automation systems
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

Good to Have:

  • Experience in the industrial vertical
  • Basic network knowledge
  • Basic knowledge of mechanical systems and assemblies.
  • Good understanding of project processes and automation systems
  • Problem solving, prioritization, and analytical skills with the ability to make recommendations to all levels of the organization
  • Good organization skills including attention to detail and multi-tasking skills

Eligible candidates:

  • Desired Qualification: Bachelors or masterâ€™s degree in Mechatronics/Electronics
  • Minimum 2+ years of experience in industrial automation/warehouse automation

We Value:

  • Constant learner to become a Subject Matter Expert
  • Proven record in start-up environment working with innovations
  • Exposure to a high paced working environment
  • Ability to conduct detailed procedures in a time-constrained environment

Unbox Robotics - Executive Business Partner to the CTO

We at Unbox Robotics are revolutionizing warehouses and distribution centers by building the world's most compact, powerful, and flexible mobile robotics systems for the new age of warehousing. Our product is the World's 1st of its kind AI-powered parcel sorting robotic system that gets installed 10X faster, saves 50+% space and improves productivity by more than 3X with 50% fewer robots than that of the competition. Founded in 2019, we are backed by marquee investors and angels. We are looking to add to our team of thinkers, innovators and doers and would love to have you join us at the Pune, India office and build the future of on-demand robotics logistics solutions
